arm_group.description: After measuring baseline plaque pH, the subjects rinsed for 1 minute with the  solution containing Stevioside extract. Plaque pH was then measured at 5, 10, 15, 30, 45 and 60 min after the mouth rinse.

After measuring baseline plaque pH, the subjects rinsed for 1 minute with the  solution containing Rebaudioside extract. Plaque pH was then measured at 5, 10, 15, 30, 45 and 60 min after the mouth rinse.
After measuring baseline plaque pH, the subjects rinsed for 1 minute with the sucrose solution. Plaque pH was then measured at 5, 10, 15, 30, 45 and 60 min after the mouth rinse.

brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of the present investigation was to evaluate the effect of stevioside and
      rebaudioside on several variables related to caries development. Two approaches were
      performed: an in vitro evaluation of the growth of a culture of  mutans streptococci and in
      vivo randomized study on the effect of a single rinse containing stevioside and rebaudioside
      on plaque-pH.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Stevia Rebaudiana Extracts on Different Variables Related to Caries: an in Vitro and in Vivo Evaluation.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

        good general health, normal salivary secretion rate, normal buffer capacity

        Exclusion Criteria:

        systemic diseases, salivary secretion reduction, reduced buffer capacity

intervention.description: After measuring baseline plaque pH, the subjects rinsed for 1 minute with the sucrose solution. Plaque pH was then measured at 5, 10, 15, 30, 45 and 60 min after the mouth rinse.
intervention.intervention_name: Effect of Stevioside and Rebaudioside on plaque pH

clinical_study.official_title: A Comparative Clinical Evaluation of the Effect of Stevia Rebaudiana Extracts and Sucrose on Dental Plaque pH (Stephan Curve Trend) Using a Microtouch Electrode in Healthy Volunteers. A Phase II Study.

overall_official.affiliation: WHO Collaborating Centre for Community Dentistry and Oral Epidemiology University of Milan

primary_outcome.description: Plaque pH was measured at baseline and 5, 10, 15, 30, 45 and 60 minutes after each mouth rinse

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Caregiver, Investigator), Primary Purpose: Prevention
